argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ring1cl.1 | |- X = ran ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | ring1cl.2 | |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) |
| 3 |  | ring1cl.3 | |- U = ( GId ` H ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_rngomndo | |- ( R e. RingOps -> H e. MndOp ) |
| 5 | 2 | #P_eleq1i | |- ( H e. MndOp <-> ( 2nd ` R ) e. MndOp ) |
| 6 |  | #P_mndoismgmOLD | |- ( ( 2nd ` R ) e. MndOp -> ( 2nd ` R ) e. Magma ) |
| 7 |  | #P_mndoisexid | |- ( ( 2nd ` R ) e. MndOp -> ( 2nd ` R ) e. ExId ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_jca | |- ( ( 2nd ` R ) e. MndOp -> ( ( 2nd ` R ) e. Magma /\ ( 2nd ` R ) e. ExId ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_sylbi | |- ( H e. MndOp -> ( ( 2nd ` R ) e. Magma /\ ( 2nd ` R ) e. ExId ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( ( 2nd ` R ) e. Magma /\ ( 2nd ` R ) e. ExId ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_elin | |- ( ( 2nd ` R ) e. ( Magma i^i ExId ) <-> ( ( 2nd ` R ) e. Magma /\ ( 2nd ` R ) e. ExId ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_sylibr | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( 2nd ` R ) e. ( Magma i^i ExId ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ran ( 2nd ` R ) = ran ( 2nd ` R ) |
| 14 | 2 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( GId ` H ) = ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) |
| 15 | 3, 14 | #P_eqtri | |- U = ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 15 | #P_iorlid | |- ( ( 2nd ` R ) e. ( Magma i^i ExId ) -> U e. ran ( 2nd ` R ) ) |
| 17 | 12, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. RingOps -> U e. ran ( 2nd ` R ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 2nd ` R ) = ( 2nd ` R ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1st ` R ) = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_rngorn1eq | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ran ( 1st ` R ) = ran ( 2nd ` R ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_eqtr | |- ( ( X = ran ( 1st ` R ) /\ ran ( 1st ` R ) = ran ( 2nd ` R ) ) -> X = ran ( 2nd ` R ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ( X = ran ( 1st ` R ) /\ ran ( 1st ` R ) = ran ( 2nd ` R ) ) -> ( U e. X <-> U e. ran ( 2nd ` R ) ) ) |
| 23 | 1, 20, 22 | #P_sylancr | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( U e. X <-> U e. ran ( 2nd ` R ) ) ) |
| 24 | 17, 23 | #P_mpbird | |- ( R e. RingOps -> U e. X ) |
